page.title: 14LOCAL NEWS 85
page.content: The year of 1985 saw the beginning of 3 new developments in the village,2 housing projects in Stocks Lane and Leigh Sinton Rd. and the renovation of the old chapel also in Leigh Sinton Rd.Both of these roads saw an increase in traffic with the L/S Road becoming increasingly controversial due to the poor surface and the County Council's inability,for various reasons,to remedy the situation.The Malvern Gazette became the mouthpiece for many letters of complaint from the local action group and the Headteachers of the schools whose children were affected.The opening of the new bridge over the River Severn at Powick also caused an increase in traffic along Stocks Lane and comment within the village.The provision of a new school and its prospective location was a very important issue through the year.
